page.title: 16THE 'PADFOOIT'
page.content: A 'Padfooit' is said to haunt Back Lane in Cawthorne, near Head Road.It is a dog-like creature about as big as a Great Dane. A person walking on his or her own at night could hear the sound of something galloping in the field behind a wall. Near St. Julien's Way in Cawthorne a footprint of the creature is visible. It is a dent in the ground . It appears to have huge feet and is said to have saucer-like eyes. {ROVER. On Gypsy lane is an old well. A long time ago one of the Huntsmen's dogs, called Rover was thought to have died. They threw the poor animal down the shaft. However, the dog was not dead . It survived in the well by eating frogs and water rats. It was there for 12 wks. before it was found.
